fields.name: Perri
fields.description: Perri works for a travel magazine, and loves going to new places! By plane, ferry or train - Perri also enjoys the journey too

fields.name: Carroto
fields.description: A cool carrot, Carroto loves long motorbike rides by the sea, leather jackets and sunglasses. But he has a soft side too!

fields.name: Cherrin
fields.description: Funny and charming, Cherrin loves making jokes and watching comedies!

fields.name: Brocco
fields.description: Always active, Brocco usually gets up early with the sunrise!

fields.name: Banoffi
fields.description: A lover of crafts, Banoffi can make all kinds of things!
